Mosquito-0.1.0.0: A stateless LCF-style implementation of higher-order logic in Haskell.

Safe HaskellSafe-Inferred

Mosquito.Utility.Extlib

Description

A module containing some useful combinators missing from the Haskell standard library.

Synopsis

  • fst3 :: (a, b, c) -> a
  • snd3 :: (a, b, c) -> b
  • thd3 :: (a, b, c) -> c

Documentation

fst3 :: (a, b, c) -> a

Returns the first component of a triple.

snd3 :: (a, b, c) -> b

Returns the second component of a triple.

thd3 :: (a, b, c) -> c

Returns the third component of a triple.
